description: Used to learn how to cook Stuffed Tofu.
bgDescription: A recipe that details how to make Stuffed Tofu.
obtainDescription: The recipe for [item="Stuffed Tofu"] can be bought on the Hongzhen Souvenir Store in Mt. Firmament. It will cost 20 [item="Wood-textured Shards"]. You can unlock this shop after completing Chapter 1: Act 7 of the main quest.
